channel.title: RuwneScaype - RuneScape 2006 Reborn
channel.description:
[b][size=24pt]RuwneScaype - RuneScape 2006 Reborn[/size][/b]
Oh noes! Another RuneScape reborn!
Yes Indeed.
I saw all other RuneScape Reborn developments, and I also wanted to make one. It's kinda fun to remake RuneScape. But, I'm not going to remake everything, because I ofcourse am not going to begin on something I know I can't end.
What I won't do is:
Quests, it will be very hard to remake everything and it will also take very long. I'll maybe only make a few basic quests.
Minigames, probably only Fight Pits and Pest Control.
Npc's, I am going to try to put all Npc's in the world, but I probably won't succeed in it. So there won't be 100% of all Npc's.
I cannot put any pictures here because there isn't much to show. I already got a base and a client.
Currently I'm only in need of some coders. Average-Good coders.
Coders: 0/2
If you want to apply:
[b]Age: Location: Time Zone: Why you want to apply as a coder:[/b]
You can reply here in this post with it filled in, or just send me a PM.

TO many remakes!
